text: I sent you a DM on who I think would be good for this
Is there any way to receive a webhook? I'd like to base my criteria off of an external webhook -- is that a possiblity?
Only thing that comes to mind would be in Workflows it may be an option, but on the front end I'm 99% sure it's not possible. You would need to set up polling instead.

you would need to format that webhook to send data int eh way that HubSpot expects it with proper authentication. Most cases this requires some middleware. For there, the data in HubSpot and can be used to trigger a workflow or a list (thinking the Timeline API here without knowing the exact use case)
I had also responded in your other thread <https://HubSpotdev.slack.com/archives/CBNDYJJAZ/p1549137386004400?thread_ts=1549131217.003500&cid=CBNDYJJAZ>
AHH, okay -- that makes sense
Does anyone know how to create a form that's vertical? I want it to be: Email input > Submit — all in one vertical line.
Really depends on how it’s set up now. You probably just have to take of any floats, display:inline or display:flex stuff in there
<@UFYTED2EA> Use Display: flex and order
it will allow you to get around the mess of markup rather easily

when using flex i encourage using:
<https://autoprefixer.github.io/>
hey just to close the loop on this… my workaround was just to grab the whole object, change it to a string, and then parse out what i needed with JS
{% set alturl = content.translated_content|string %}
not super pretty but it worked
Anyone know if it’s possible to make a blog hidden from the sitemap?
or really disable a blog in general without deleting it?>
Is there anyway from within HubSpot to verify the SPF record?
I’d like to report a :bug: - when swapping the template of a site I’m getting the preview for another companie’s template <https://spin.d.pr/ZewBgA+>
Template works fine, I’m just seeing someone else’s template preview lol
Yea I've noticed it's weird too, when I swap template in the preview it shows the current template rather than the new template
Hi All, would like to ask if someone has an experience on working with Splash + HubSpot integration?
For those still fighting with ssl naked redirect issues there is now a service called <http://nakedssl.com|nakedssl.com>
